DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether shockwave therapy effective treatment unspecific acute low back pain sham therapy . 60 patient acute low back pain recruit single-blinded , randomize , placebo-controlled trial . They randomize receive either shockwave therapy sham treatment identically look device 4 week , twice week . Additionally patient receive physiotherapy twice week allow take anti-inflammatory drug , necessary even 4 week . The primary outcome variable measure day 0 , every week treatment ( day 7 ; 14 ; 21 28 ) 4 week last treatment . The clinical outcome primarily measure pain intensity use visual analogue scale . Secondary outcome measure Oswestry Disability Index , Beck ` Pain Depression Scale , Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire EQ-5D . Data analyse difference change score group use one-way t-test .
